page.title: 14Harpenden Police
page.content: P.C. Moffat is the community policeman for the Batford area. He lives in Tuffnells Way and as soon as he comes out of his door he is on duty. He walks and cycles around the area. His warrant number is 841. He wears a uniform that is dark blue. He has silver polished buttons. His helmet is very hard and is good for rainy days. It is made of compressed cork. He has a truncheon which is made of oak. He doesn't carry his truncheon much, just on the odd occasions. He has only hit two people with his truncheon in the 20 years he has been in the police force. P.C.Moffat was an engineer before he became a policeman. He said that real police work is not at all like the serials we watch on television. He enjoys his work very much.
